snippet: A federal advisory panel recommended approval of a rheumatoid arthritis pill known as tofacitinib, but several members expressed concern about its safety.
abstract: Federal advisory panel recommends approval of Pfizer's rheumatoid arthritis pill tofacitinib, but several members express concern about its safety and urge the Food and Drug Administration to require rigorous follow-up studies.
lead_paragraph: A federal advisory panel recommended approval of a rheumatoid arthritis pill known as tofacitinib, but several members expressed concern about its safety.

headline.seo: Pfizer’s Rheumatoid Arthritis Pill Wins Federal Panel’s Approval
headline.main: Arthritis Pill From Pfizer Wins Support of U.S. Panel
headline.print_headline: Arthritis Pill From Pfizer Wins Support Of U.S. Panel
